column5: There should be a large push of fish into the rivermouths this week. Nice cold water in close.  Check out the classic off shore temperature blow    http://www.coastwatch.msu.edu/ontario/o1.html  Just what the doctor ordered for the peir fisherman!
They've been around for atleast month already.
The Salmon have run up the creeks, go check it out.  Volleyball nets, Machetes, and Baseball bats seem to be the popular method of capture  Tony
They're out of stock though; not sure when the next shipment will arrive.
Seriously, I have seen all 3 of those items in use over the years

Yep, was drifting yesterday. There are some browns in and I think I even spotted a bow. My trick? Stay away from the pools with fifteen 20 pounds class salmon and 8 guys trying to snag them. I shoot for the trout, and smaller salmon. Its called fishing, not snagging!
